TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {24912=2006, 4979=2015, 29286=2004, 9452=2013, 20556=2008, 7220=2014, 32298=2002, 31464=2003, 13949=2011, 22734=2007, 3447=July 1997 - Starts managing first fund, 27090=2005, 11675=2012, 16181=2010, 35290=Whilst at Newton, Clive Beagles managed the Newton Higher Income fund as well as various pooled and segregated institutional funds. An economics graduate from Nottingham, he started life with Commercial Union before switching, after seven years in 1996, to Newton. As chair of the group’s UK Equity Policy group, he lead weekly discussions on determining the house view on UK equities. In 2004 Beagles joined J O Hambro Capital Management and currently takes command of the JOHCM UK Equity Income fund., 18378=2009}
